com.konakart.bl.modules.ordertotal.externaltax

Class ExternalTax

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakart.bl.modules.BaseModule
      • com.konakart.bl.modules.ordertotal.BaseOrderTotalModule
        • com.konakart.bl.modules.ordertotal.externaltax.ExternalTax
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OrderTotalInterface

    public class ExternalTax
extends BaseOrderTotalModule
implements OrderTotalInterface
    Module that creates an OrderTotal object for the amount of tax for the order and removes any External tax line from the list of OrderTotals.
